dcterms:description: A collection of 500 synthetic datasets randomly generated for training models on a few data points to analyze the inductive bias of RNNs.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Datasets

dcterms:creator: J. C. White
R. Cotterell
dcterms:description: A dataset constructed using Context Free Grammar (CFG) to create parallel synthetic language corpora with controlled typological features.
dcterms:title: Context Free Grammar (CFG)

dcterms:creator: E. Kharitonov
R. Chaabouni
dcterms:description: A set of synthetic tasks designed for the sequence-to-sequence framework, aimed at studying inductive biases in seq2seq learners.
dcterms:title: Kharitonov and Chaabouni's Synthetic Tasks

dcterms:description: A dataset constructed for binary sequence classification tasks, where the input is the prefixes of a binary sequence and the output is a set of categorical distributions over binary labels.
dcterms:title: Binary Sequence Dataset
